name: Flappy Boids
description:
Enjoy two new game modes that put a fun twist on Flappy Bird.

Bird Train - spawn up to 10,000 birds in sequence. Press space to make birds jump through pipes and backspace if you want to retry.

Bird Flock - spawn up to 10,000 birds at once! Press space to control the big blue bird and the smaller ones will follow. 

See how far you can get!
